markdownRemark.html: Waterparks in the Sea (Fuengirola) - Costa Water Parks is a local company which has inflatable and floating water parks at different locations along the coast. Also located in Sotogrande, Puerto Banus, Mijas Costa and Benalmádena (in front of Bil-Bil Castle)
